verses.verse: Then they told <S%H5046><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> fight <S%H3898><s%> against Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> and they rob <S%H8154><s%> the threshing floors. <S%H1637><s%>

Therefore David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Shall I go <S%H3212><s%> and smite <S%H5221><s%> these <S%H428><s%> Philistines? <S%H6430><s%> And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to David, <S%H1732><s%> Go, <S%H3212><s%> and smite <S%H5221><s%> the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> Keilah. <S%H7084><s%>

And David's <S%H1732><s%> men <S%H582><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, Behold, <S%H2009><s%> we be afraid <S%H3373><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> in Judah: <S%H3063><s%> how <S%H637><s%> much <S%H637><s%> more then <S%H3588><s%> if <S%H3588><s%> we come <S%H3212><s%> to Keilah <S%H7084><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the armies <S%H4634><s%> of the Philistines? <S%H6430><s%>

Then David <S%H1732><s%> inquired <S%H7592><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> again. <S%H3254><s%> And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> him and said, <S%H559><s%> Arise, <S%H6965><s%> go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Keilah; <S%H7084><s%> for I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> into your hand. <S%H3027><s%>

So David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> and fought <S%H3898><s%> with the Philistines, <S%H6430><s%> and brought <S%H5090><s%> away their cattle, <S%H4735><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> them with a great <S%H1419><s%> slaughter. <S%H4347><s%> So David <S%H1732><s%> saved <S%H3467><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Keilah. <S%H7084><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when Abiathar <S%H54><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahimelech <S%H288><s%> fled <S%H1272><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> to Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> that he came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> with an ephod <S%H646><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And it was told <S%H5046><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> was come <S%H935><s%> to Keilah. <S%H7084><s%> And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has delivered <S%H5234><s%> him into my hand; <S%H3027><s%> for he is shut <S%H5462><s%> in, by entering <S%H935><s%> into a town <S%H5892><s%> that has gates <S%H1817><s%> and bars. <S%H1280><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> called <S%H8085><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> to war, <S%H4421><s%> to go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> to besiege <S%H6696><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and his men. <S%H582><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> secretly <S%H2790><s%> practiced <S%H2790><s%> mischief <S%H7451><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> him; and he said <S%H559><s%> to Abiathar <S%H54><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> Bring <S%H5066><s%> here <S%H5066><s%> the ephod. <S%H646><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> your servant <S%H5650><s%> has certainly heard <S%H8085><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> seeks <S%H1245><s%> to come <S%H935><s%> to Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> for my sake. <S%H5668><s%>

Will the men <S%H1167><s%> of Keilah <S%H7084><s%> deliver <S%H5462><s%> me up into his hand? <S%H3027><s%> will Saul <S%H7586><s%> come <S%H3381><s%> down, <S%H3381><s%> as your servant <S%H5650><s%> has heard? <S%H8085><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> I beseech <S%H4994><s%> you, tell <S%H5046><s%> your servant. <S%H5650><s%> And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> He will come <S%H3381><s%> down. <S%H3381><s%>

Then said <S%H559><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> Will the men <S%H1167><s%> of Keilah <S%H7084><s%> deliver <S%H5462><s%> me and my men <S%H582><s%> into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Saul? <S%H7586><s%> And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> They will deliver <S%H5462><s%> you up.

Then David <S%H1732><s%> and his men, <S%H582><s%> which were about six <S%H8337><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> and departed <S%H3318><s%> out of Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> and went <S%H1980><s%> wherever <S%H834><s%> they could go. <S%H1980><s%> And it was told <S%H5046><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> that David <S%H1732><s%> was escaped <S%H4422><s%> from Keilah; <S%H7084><s%> and he declined <S%H2308><s%> to go <S%H3318><s%> forth. <S%H3318><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> stayed <S%H3427><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> in strong <S%H4679><s%> holds, <S%H4679><s%> and remained <S%H3427><s%> in a mountain <S%H2022><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Ziph. <S%H2128><s%> And Saul <S%H7586><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> him every <S%H3605><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> but God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> him not into his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And David <S%H1732><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that Saul <S%H7586><s%> was come <S%H3318><s%> out to seek <S%H1245><s%> his life: <S%H5315><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> was in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Ziph <S%H2128><s%> in a wood. <S%H2793><s%>

And Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> Saul's <S%H7586><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> into the wood, <S%H2793><s%> and strengthened <S%H2388><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> in God. <S%H430><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to him, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not: for the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Saul <S%H7586><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> shall not find <S%H4672><s%> you; and you shall be king <S%H4427><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and I shall be next <S%H4932><s%> to you; and that also <S%H1571><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> knows. <S%H3045><s%>

And they two <S%H8147><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> stayed <S%H3427><s%> in the wood, <S%H2793><s%> and Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> to his house. <S%H1004><s%>

Then came <S%H5927><s%> up the Ziphites <S%H2130><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%> to Gibeah, <S%H1390><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Does not David <S%H1732><s%> hide <S%H5641><s%> himself with us in strong <S%H4679><s%> holds <S%H4679><s%> in the wood, <S%H2793><s%> in the hill <S%H1389><s%> of Hachilah, <S%H2444><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the south <S%H3225><s%> of Jeshimon? <S%H3452><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, O king, <S%H4428><s%> come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> the desire <S%H183><s%> of your soul <S%H5315><s%> to come <S%H3381><s%> down; <S%H3381><s%> and our part shall be to deliver <S%H5462><s%> him into the king's <S%H4428><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>
And Saul <S%H7586><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be you of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for you have compassion <S%H2550><s%> on me.

Go, <S%H3212><s%> I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, prepare <S%H3559><s%> yet, and know <S%H3045><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> his place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> his haunt <S%H7272><s%> is, and who <S%H4310><s%> has seen <S%H7200><s%> him there: <S%H8033><s%> for it is told <S%H559><s%> me that he deals very subtly. <S%H6191><s%>

See <S%H7200><s%> therefore, and take knowledge <S%H3045><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> the lurking <S%H4224><s%> places where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> he hides <S%H2244><s%> himself, and come <S%H7725><s%> you again <S%H7725><s%> to me with the certainty, <S%H3559><s%> and I will go <S%H1980><s%> with you: and it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, if <S%H518><s%> he be in the land, <S%H776><s%> that I will search <S%H2664><s%> him out throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

And they arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> to Ziph <S%H2128><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Saul: <S%H7586><s%> but David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> were in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Maon, <S%H4584><s%> in the plain <S%H6160><s%> on <S%H413><s%> the south <S%H3225><s%> of Jeshimon. <S%H3452><s%>

Saul <S%H7586><s%> also and his men <S%H582><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to seek <S%H1245><s%> him. And they told <S%H5046><s%> David; <S%H1732><s%> why he came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> into a rock, <S%H5553><s%> and stayed <S%H3427><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Maon. <S%H4584><s%> And when Saul <S%H7586><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> that, he pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Maon. <S%H4584><s%>

And Saul <S%H7586><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> on this <S%H2088><s%> side <S%H6654><s%> of the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> on that side <S%H6654><s%> of the mountain: <S%H2022><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> made haste <S%H2648><s%> to get <S%H3212><s%> away <S%H3212><s%> for fear <S%H6440><s%> of Saul; <S%H7586><s%> for Saul <S%H7586><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> compassed <S%H5849><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and his men <S%H582><s%> round about to take <S%H8610><s%> them.

But there came <S%H935><s%> a messenger <S%H4397><s%> to Saul, <S%H7586><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Haste <S%H4116><s%> you, and come; <S%H3212><s%> for the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> have invaded <S%H6584><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

Why Saul <S%H7586><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> from pursuing <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> David, <S%H1732><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> the Philistines: <S%H6430><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> they called that place <S%H4725><s%> Selahammahlekoth. <S%H5555><s%>
And David <S%H1732><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up from there, <S%H8033><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in strong <S%H4679><s%> holds <S%H4679><s%> at <S%H413><s%> Engedi. <S%H5872><s%>
